name: notes_backend
description: Backend for notes app with node.js

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../../fs-server-communication-fso/fs-scratch-server-communication-fso/1_notes_app && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../fs-server-program-fso/fs-scratch-server-program-fso/1_notes_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "build(fe): build FE & move `dist` dir. to BE" && git push

author: Rickyslash
